Summary: Red light in sky going south
divs: Sighting Details At 6:50PM on Saturday 23,2013 during a birthday for a 2 year old in a backyard in riverside California, I noticed a red light in the sky heading south in our direction.Three others I was with noticed it also, I said it's a UFO. at that moment it changed direction turning west as it turned the light slowly went out as it descend and slowed to almost a stop, Then continued west without light's. It was still visible in the darkness it looked like a football shaped mass that seemed to blend in with the darkness of the night as it traveled on a path that seemed to descend west, We watched it till it was out of sight. I felt like the UFO knew we saw it so it changed direction.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around November 23rd 2013
